mapper.insert: insert into post(postName, postContent, userNickname, userPW, postIMG) values (#{postName}, #{postContent}, #{userNickname}, #{userPW}, #{postIMG})
mapper.select: SELECT postNo, postName, postContent, userNickname, postIMG, FROM post
SELECT postNo, comentContent, comentCreateDate, comentNickname, comentPW, comentNo, cocomentNo, comentDepth FROM coment
